titles.title: Enhancing Emergency and Retirement Savings Act of 2021
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for penalty-free withdrawals from retirement accounts for certain emergency expenses, and for other purposes.
Enhancing Emergency and Retirement Savings Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Enhancing Emergency and Retirement Savings Act of 2021
This bill permits penalty-free distributions, up to $1,000, from tax-exempt retirement plans for emergency personal expenses, limited to one distribution in a calendar year. The bill allows repayment to plans of such distributions over a three-year period.
